p: Changes in mitochondrial membrane potential (Δψm) following treatment with PPD and the protective effect of RSE on PPD induced apoptosis, were measured after staining with 3,3′dihexyloxacarbocyanine iodide (DiOC 6) obtained from Sigma-Aldrich (St. Louis, MO, USA). After treatment, the cells were harvested and incubated with PBS containing 50 nM DiOC 6 for 15 min at 37 °C prior to flow cytometric analysis.
